topics.title: Gray wolves are hunting sea otters and no one knows how
topics.summary: Gesellschaftlich relevantes Thema mit großem visuellen Potenzial. On a remote Alaskan island, gray wolves are rewriting the rulebook by hunting sea otters — a behavior few scientists ever expected to see. Researchers are now uncovering how these coastal wolves adapt
